page.title: 13THE WORK OF A COALMAN
page.content: The{coalman}delivers coal on a lorry.The tools of his trade are shovels and bricks,which are used to weight the sacks down to prevent them blowing off the lorry. The main{advantages}of the job are that the work is{outdoors}and the{ {wages}are good. The{disadvantages}are that the coalman very often suffers from{ {back-trouble}due to the stooping,and the carrying of {heavy weights}.It can also be very unpleasant in bad weather. As the coalman is{self-employed},he sometimes has bad debts,which means that the customer cannot afford to pay for the coal,and therefore the coalman has less wages.
